CustomField.formula:
IF( AND(TEXT(BillingCountryCode) = "US", OR(RecordTypeId = "01236000001I3BV",RecordTypeId = "01236000001M2TW", RecordTypeId = "01236000001M2TX")), LEFT( TRIM( BillingPostalCode ) , 5),
IF( AND(TEXT(BillingCountryCode) = "CA", OR(AND(RecordTypeId = "01236000000OmxQ", TEXT(Type) = 'Roofer'),RecordTypeId = "01236000001M2TW", RecordTypeId = "01236000001M2TX")), LEFT( TRIM( BillingPostalCode ) , 3),
NULL) )
CustomField.label: Trimmed Postal Code formula
